text: my name is Adam Bush nut I'm the
business development manager at Zeus
Zeus is a UK company specialized in
providing cloud backup solutions our
company has 70 plus employees around the
world and we're protecting the data of 9
million users we started in 2011 as a
traditional allowed backup solution with
time and feedback from our customers we
started to learn that the problem is not
with actually moving the data to the
cloud it's with having access to the
files and locating your files specific
files when you wanted so we started to
think outside the box and thinking of
ways to create a solution that can help
our customers to reach specific files
when they want them without needing
spent too much time to locate these
files we created the solution and hosted
entirely on AWS in terms of storage in
terms of servers in terms of databases
and of course the machine learning or
the recognition for image detection and
the face and object detection we process
the images using Amazon recognition and
then we extract the metadata we create
indexes for objects and faces and then
we consolidate same faces within one
thumbnail or one image for this face
where you can access them and retrieve
them in a very quick manner the same
goes for objects it's a very convenient
and nice way to get your files and
images located in the least time
possible the key benefit of using
recognition was to introduce two main
features which are object detection and
face detection and this led us to
annotating the consumer market in a very
unexpected way because we were mainly
focusing on b2b and with these features
provided by Electrician we were
to expand our coverage to the b2c market
so for us AWS is a one-stop shop it's
very convenient for us to rely on one
provider which is AWS to have all the
features that we need to keep our
solution running in one place with time
and with our ties to the Amazon
technician we were convinced that the
results we are getting from Amazon are
much accurate from other providers and
it also helped us in quality of service
that we are able to offer it has a very
big role in our success today and in
becoming one of the largest and
recognized names in the cloud backup
industry
[Music]
